TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeArrayIndexerExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Docs.summary: Represents a reference to an index of an array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeArrayIndexerExpression can be used to represent a reference to an index of an array of one or more dimensions. Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIndexerExpression> for representing a reference to an index of a code (non-array) indexer. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.TargetObject%2A> property indicates the indexer object. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.Indices%2A> property indicates either a single index within the target array, or a set of indexes that together specify a specific intersection of indexes across the dimensions of the array.
## Examples The following code creates a CodeArrayIndexerExpression that references index 5 of an array of integers named `x` :
[!code-vb[CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codearr_0_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.codearr_0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codearr_0_1.cs)]

Docs.param: A that indicates the array the indexer targets.
The index or indexes to reference.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified target object and indexes.
Gets or sets the index or indexes of the indexer expression.
Docs.value: A that indicates the index or indexes of the indexer expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection> can contain a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> that specifies a single index within the target array, or multiple <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> objects that together specify a specific intersection of indexes across the dimensions of the array.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the target object of the array indexer.
Docs.value: A that represents the array being indexed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property typically contains either a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression>, a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression>, or a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>.
